entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]The string "Configured to use loose manifests when installing new manifests." is not localized in dotnet --info output on Loc OS. #41180
  • dotnet pack does not support multiple architectures when PublishReadyToRun is enabled #41179
  • global.json file SDK version is "9.0.100-preview.5.24269.5" but I dont see that SDK version anywhere #41176

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the VMR commit hash for dotnet --info #41190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update to may implicit version #41177
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41159
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Dispose streams created by File.Create #41120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds fingerprinting support for assets #41092
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix getting path to full framework MSBuild #40934
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add SmokeTestsLicenseScanPath prop for LicenseScan Test #41143
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning for PreferNativeArm64 #40895
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41131
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to may implicit version #41164
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
